title: Mechanisms of manipulating valley splitting in MoTe2/MnS2 van der Waals heterostructure by electric field and strains
content:

Xiao Liang, Yiqun Liu, Tianjun Zhong, Ting Yang, Jie Li, Li Luo, Gao Dong, Yanhong Chen, Xuelian Luo, Tingting Tang, Lei Bi
The valley splitting increases (decreases) with the increasing induced magnetic moments in MoTe2/MnS2 heterostructure by applying electric field (biaxial strains). The dominating mechanism is the competition of interlayer MPE and SOC of MoTe2.
